Package png

Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChunkDirectory
    This class provides the functionality to maintain chunk data stored in a Directory, grouped by its category.
    ChunkHandler
    Handles the processing and collection of metadata-related chunks from a PNG image file.
    MetadataPNG<T extends BaseMetadata>
    A concrete metadata container for PNG files, supporting both embedded Exif data (from eXIf chunks) and textual data (from tEXt, zTXt, iTXt chunks).
    MetadataPNG2<T extends BaseMetadata>
    A concrete metadata container for PNG files, supporting both embedded Exif data (from eXIf chunks) and textual data (from tEXt, zTXt, iTXt chunks).
    PngChunk
    Represents an individual chunk in a PNG file.
    PngChunkITXT
    Extended to support an iTXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores international text data.
    PngChunkTEXT
    Represents a tEXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores original textual data.
    PngChunkZTXT
    Extended to support a zTXt (compressed textual data) chunk in a PNG file.
    PngParser
    This program aims to read PNG image files and retrieve data structured in a series of chunks.
    TextEntry
    Represents a textual metadata entry within a PNG chunk, consisting of a tag type, keyword, and associated text value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChunkType
    Represents the various types of chunks found in a PNG image file, as defined by the PNG specification.
    ChunkType.Category
    Defines categories for PNG chunk types, grouping them by their general purpose.
    TextKeyword
    Enumerates known PNG textual metadata keywords, typically found in chunks of type tEXt, iTXt, or zTXt.

Package png Description

Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.

Includes support for chunk decoding, image metadata extraction, and ancillary data handling.

Since:
July 2025
Author:
Trevor Maggs
